backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing authorization, invite onboarding, user profiles, notifications, and vehicle management with storage and admin‑gated functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for several frontend files related to profiles and routing.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with auth gating and routes for onboarding, vehicles, admin tools, and user features.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access‑denied message with a button returning to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Internet Identity login screen with branding and informational content.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Logo component rendering the application image in configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper handling header visibility based on authentication and onboarding state.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog UI for submitting a lost-vehicle report with validation and mutation trigger.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog allowing users to submit a found-vehicle report tied to a specific vehicle.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Application header with navigation, notifications, user menu, and admin access handling.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Panel to initiate vehicle ownership transfer, showing PIN dialog and generated transfer code.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: Reusable dialog prompting for a PIN with error handling and submission flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and handles query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Hooks for admin-related queries and mutations, including admin checks, stats, invite codes, and registered vehicles.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch lost vehicles and mutate lost/found status, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Implements hooks to fetch user notifications with polling and mark them as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Contains a mutation hook to complete user onboarding and refresh the profile cache.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Offers mutations for setting up and updating a user's PIN through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Includes hooks to fetch a placeholder user profile and a no-op profile-saving mutation with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Defines mutations for initiating and accepting vehicle transfers, updating related cached data.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Provides hooks to fetch user vehicles, fetch a single vehicle, and register new vehicles with cache refresh.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, theming variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Page allowing users to enter or prefill a transfer code to accept a vehicle transfer with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing system statistics and navigation to token management and vehicle lists.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin page for generating, listing, and managing invitation tokens with copy‑link functionality.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying vehicle, lost vehicle, and notification stats with quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Page listing lost vehicles with search filtering and vehicle detail display including photos.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications, allows marking them as read, and shows loading/empty states.
Handles account onboarding using an invite token and user profile form, then completes onboarding and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the user's profile info, including principal ID, with a notice that updates require admin assistance.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides a form to register a vehicle, including photo upload with progress tracking, then submits data to the backend.
Manages creation and updating of a PIN used for secure vehicle transfers, with validation and status handling.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays full details of a specific vehicle, including status, photo, and ownership actions like transfers or lost reports.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Displays the user's registered vehicles with status badges and navigation to registration or vehicle detail pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and utility plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, architecture, known issues, and current implementation state.
